name: SmartCounter
0:
”Alexa, open smart counter”
”count up to 10”
”count down from 10”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: smart counter
des:
Counts up to or down from a given number. Users can set the break time between numbers, speaking rate and a suffix (e.g. Mississippi) to control how numbers are counted.

To start, just say "Alexa, open smart counter" or "Alexa, launch smart counter" to count up to or count down from a given number.

At anytime, you can stop by saying "Alexa, stop".
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
